text:
@BorisJohnson It's a distraction!
They are simply pursuing their #HerdImmunity plan.

The #COVID19 #CumGate saga is simply keeping everyone busy while the death toll rises & people are 'doing what Cummings would' when they are really risking lives.
#StayHomeSaveLives
#CummingsDistraction
